translated: I have taught this Dharma-mudrā sūtra in order to eliminate the doubts of all sentient beings and the many beings of the future.

original: ro; ;'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: ro; ;'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: “Lokapālas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams phan pa'i dngos po bzhi mthong bas ma 'ongs pa'i dus su mdo sde 'di la sogs pa bsrung ba dang / 'dzin par yi dam len to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams phan pa'i dngos po bzhi mthong bas ma 'ongs pa'i dus su mdo sde 'di la sogs pa bsrung ba dang / 'dzin par yi dam len to //
translated: because bodhisattva-mahāsattvas see four beneficial things, they vow to protect and uphold sūtras such as this in the future.

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di snyam du bdag gis myur du yon tan tshad med dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyur snyam pa dang / sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po skye zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag pa'i chos 'dzin cing bsrung ba yin no snyam pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di snyam du bdag gis myur du yon tan tshad med dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyur snyam pa dang / sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po skye zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag pa'i chos 'dzin cing bsrung ba yin no snyam pa dang /
translated: Bodhisattvas think, ‘I will quickly attain immeasurable, limitless qualities,’ and ‘sentient beings will give rise to great roots of virtue and uphold and protect the true Dharma in the buddha-realm.’

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sde snod 'dzin pa yin no snyam pa dang / sangs rgyas tshad med pa rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags par 'gyur ro snyam du sems dpa' dang bzhi'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sde snod 'dzin pa yin no snyam pa dang / sangs rgyas tshad med pa rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags par 'gyur ro snyam du sems dpa' dang bzhi'o //
translated: I will uphold the Dharma piṭaka of all buddhas.”

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: “Lokapālas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyed la sogs pas ngas bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong gi bar du bsgrubs pa'i chos kyi dkon mchog gi sde snod 'di lta dang mi rnams la shin tu rgyas par shod cig /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyed la sogs pas ngas bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong gi bar du bsgrubs pa'i chos kyi dkon mchog gi sde snod 'di lta dang mi rnams la shin tu rgyas par shod cig /
translated: you bodhisattva mahāsattvas and others should widely teach this Dharma jewel piṭaka that I have accomplished over hundreds of thousands of incalculable eons to humans.”

original: de'i tshe bzang skyong la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de'i tshe bzang skyong la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: At that time, Bhadrapāla and others bowed their heads to the Bhagavān’s feet and said,

original: bdag cag gi rngo ci thogs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis phyi ma ma mchis pa'i dus su chos dkon mchog 'di rgyas par ston cing bshad par 'tshal lo zhes gsol to //
analyzed: bdag cag gi rngo ci thogs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis phyi ma ma mchis pa'i dus su chos dkon mchog 'di rgyas par ston cing bshad par 'tshal lo zhes gsol to //
translated: “To the best of our abilities, we will widely teach and explain this Dharma jewel in the future through the Bhagavān’s blessing.”

original: chos kyi phyag rgya'i mdo sde 'di gsungs pa'i tshe @122b dpag tu med tshad med grangs med pa snyed kyi skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba lhun gyis grub bo //
analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya'i mdo sde 'di gsungs pa'i tshe @122b dpag tu med tshad med grangs med pa snyed kyi skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba lhun gyis grub bo //
translated: When this sutra of the Dharma-mudra was spoken, the roots of virtue of bodhisattvas who were only one birth away from buddhahood were spontaneously accomplished.

original: sems can tshad med pa brgya stong rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
analyzed: sems can tshad med pa brgya stong rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
translated: Innumerable hundreds of thousands of sentient beings gave rise to the mind set on unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gdon mi za bar lung bstan to //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gdon mi za bar lung bstan to //
translated: They were without doubt prophesied to attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten 'dzin dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag dang / 'khor rnam bzhi dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten 'dzin dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag dang / 'khor rnam bzhi dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o //
translated: After the Bhagavān spoke thus, the bodhisattva Lokadhara, the bodhisattvas Bhadrapāla and the others, the fourfold assembly, and all the devas, humans, asuras, and so forth rejoiced in the Bhagavān's teachings.

original: gdams pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis so ////
analyzed: gdams pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis so ////
translated: This concludes the twelfth chapter, on the instructions.

original: 'phags pa 'jig rten 'dzin ces bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jig rten 'dzin ces bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so //
translated: The noble Sūtra called “Upholding the World” is complete.
